title: The Adventures of Alice Morris: Planner Extraordinaire

story.text: In the bustling city of Metroville, Alice Morris discovered her ability to see a few seconds into the future only during planning sessions. Today, she intercepted a plan to rob the central bank.
Using her meticulous planning skills, Alice mapped out the entire bank, pinpointing how to thwart the robbery. She anonymously tipped off the police, who were prepared just in time.
A citywide blackout threatened chaos. With her foresight, Alice executed a flawless emergency response plan, guiding the city's officials to restore power methodically and efficiently.
Noticing a pattern in the disasters, Alice started to suspect someone was testing her abilities. She spent the day devising a plan to catch the mysterious antagonist.
Alice put her plan into action, drawing the antagonist into a trap at the Metroville Historical Museum during a planned exhibit opening.
During the confrontation, Alice's antagonist revealed himself as a time-displaced villain seeking her guidance in mastering his own powers in the current era.
After a tense discussion, Alice persuaded him to use his powers for good, guiding him to integrate into society and apply his abilities to aid in disaster prevention.

ending: With her newfound ally, planning and preparedness took on a whole new dimension for both the future and the present of Metroville.
moral: Even the most unexpected skills can be sources of great power when used wisely.
